name: Dropbox
goal: Dropbox is a service that lets you bring all your photos, docs, and videos anywhere, and share them easily. Any file you save to your Dropbox will automatically save to all your computers, your phone or tablet, and the Dropbox website. Dropbox also makes it easy to share with others. And if your computer melts down, you can restore all your files from the Dropbox website with a couple clicks.
euInitiatives: Following policy developments in relation to tech sector, including digital single market strategy, privacy, security and data protection.
